title: Tuna Sandwich
ingredients: 2 slices of bread. 1 can of tuna. 2 tbsp mayonnaise. 1 leaf of lettuce. 2 slices of tomato.
steps: Mix tuna with mayonnaise. Spread the mixture on one slice of bread. Add lettuce and tomato. Top with the other slice of bread.

title: Caesar Salad Wrap
ingredients: 1 tortilla. 1 cup romaine lettuce. 50g grilled chicken. 2 tbsp Caesar dressing. 10g parmesan cheese.
steps: Lay the tortilla flat. Add lettuce, chicken, dressing, and cheese. Roll the tortilla tightly into a wrap.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 cup broccoli. 1 cup carrots. 1 bell pepper. 2 tbsp soy sauce. 1 tbsp sesame oil.
steps: Heat oil in a pan. Add the vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes. Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.

title: Chicken Pita Pocket
ingredients: 1 pita bread. 100g grilled chicken. 50g hummus. 1 cucumber. 1 tbsp tzatziki.
steps: Cut the pita bread in half. Fill with chicken, hummus, sliced cucumber, and tzatziki.

title: Avocado Toast
ingredients: 1 slice of bread. 1/2 avocado. Salt and pepper to taste. 1 egg (optional).
steps: Toast the bread. Mash the avocado and spread it on the toast. Season with salt and pepper. Top with a fried or poached egg if desired.

title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: 2 tomatoes. 100g mozzarella. Fresh basil leaves. 1 tbsp olive oil. Salt and pepper.
steps: Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange them on a plate with basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: 2 slices of bread. 2 slices of cheese. 1 tbsp butter.
steps: Butter one side of each bread slice. Place cheese between the unbuttered sides. Grill in a pan until golden brown on both sides.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: 1 cucumber. 2 tomatoes. 50g feta cheese. 10 olives. 1 tbsp olive oil. 1 tsp oregano.
steps: Chop the cucumber and tomatoes. Mix with feta and olives. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: 1 cup romaine lettuce. 100g grilled chicken. 2 tbsp Caesar dressing. 10g parmesan cheese. 10 croutons.
steps: Toss lettuce, chicken, dressing, and cheese in a bowl. Top with croutons before serving.

title: Vegetarian Sushi Roll
ingredients: 1 sheet of nori. 1 cup cooked sushi rice. 1/4 avocado. 1/4 cucumber. 1 carrot.
steps: Lay the nori sheet on a mat. Spread rice evenly. Add avocado, cucumber, and carrot. Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
